title: Parker Takes a Bullet
description: "...growing up the daughter of a detective, Evelyn learned a few things about police work. When the investigation into her father's murder grinds to a halt, Evelyn decides to do some sleuthing of her own, determined to exonerate her dad. In the process she plays loose with the law, tails a too charming suspect, uncovers a worldwide web of international crime, and learns that things are not always how they appear." -- P.[4] of cover.
author: Lewis Hall
